mapper.select:
select * from ALERTSYSTEM_PROCESS where 1=1
and ZT_WORKING_ID=#{ztWorkingId}

SELECT
ets.sID AS styleID, ets.sNumber, ets.xStyleNo, lsi.xStatus AS isReceive, lsi.xDateTime AS gonYiSendTime, emp.xName AS gongYiSendEmpl, lsr.xDateTime AS gongYiReceiveTime FROM ERPDB.dbo.lt_style_issue lsi LEFT JOIN ERPDB.dbo.et_style ets ON lsi.rStyle_ID = ets.sID LEFT JOIN ERPDB.dbo.zt_empl emp ON lsi.rEmpl_ID = emp.sID LEFT JOIN ERPDB.dbo.lt_style_receive lsr ON lsr.rStyle_ID = ets.sID WHERE ets.xStatus = 2 and ets.xDataType=3
ORDER BY ets.sID DESC

SELECT lsi.sID, lsi.xDateTime AS 'fromTimestamp', emp.xName AS 'employeeName' FROM ERPDB.dbo.lt_style_issue lsi LEFT JOIN ERPDB.dbo.zt_empl emp ON lsi.rEmpl_ID = emp.sID WHERE lsi.rStyle_ID=#{styleID}

SELECT lsi2.sID, lsi2.xDateTime AS 'fromTimestamp', emp.xName AS 'employeeName', lsi2.xStatus AS isReceive, lsr2.xDateTime AS 'toTimestamp' FROM ERPDB.dbo.lt_style_issue2 lsi2 LEFT JOIN ERPDB.dbo.lt_style_receive2 lsr2 ON lsi2.sID = lsr2.rIssue_ID LEFT JOIN ERPDB.dbo.zt_empl emp ON lsi2.rEmpl_ID = emp.sID WHERE lsi2.rStyle_ID =#{styleID}

SELECT lsr2.sID, lsr2.xDateTime AS 'fromTimestamp', emp.xName AS 'employeeName' FROM ERPDB.dbo.lt_style_receive2 lsr2 LEFT JOIN ERPDB.dbo.zt_empl emp ON lsr2.rEmpl_ID = emp.sID WHERE lsr2.rStyle_ID=#{styleID}

SELECT DISTINCT TOP (1) iss.sID, iss.xDateTime AS 'sendTime', zt.rDept_ID AS 'deptId', sendEmp.xName AS 'sendEmployee', issbc.aStatus, rec.xDateTime AS 'receiveTime', resieveEmp.xName AS 'receiveName' FROM ERPDB.dbo.lt_issue60 iss LEFT JOIN ERPDB.dbo.lt_issue60_bc issbc ON iss.sID = issbc.mID LEFT JOIN ERPDB.dbo.zt_empl sendEmp ON iss.rEmpl_ID = sendEmp.sID LEFT JOIN ERPDB.dbo.lt_receive60 rec ON issbc.aDataID = rec.sID LEFT JOIN ERPDB.dbo.zt_empl resieveEmp ON rec.rEmpl_ID = resieveEmp.sID LEFT JOIN zt_working zt ON zt.sID = iss.rWork_ID WHERE issbc.xBC LIKE CAST ( ( SELECT card.xCard FROM ERPDB.dbo.pt_card card WHERE card.rStyle_ID = #{styleID} ) AS VARCHAR ) + '%' ORDER BY iss.sID DESC
